resources.string: Please restart the application after giving Root permission
Riru - IFW Enhance has been properly applied
Riru - IFW Enhance has not been properly applied
Go to hell you f*ck app always occupy share sheet
Riru - IFW Enhance has not been properly applied. Anything you do may not take effect.
The IFW rules written by this application have been cleared. Please submit again to take effect.
Your device is not yet Rooted or you have forbidden this application to obtain Root permission.
The IFW rules are in force

This application requires Root permission to work properly.If your device is not yet Rooted or if you forbidden this application to obtain Root permission, it will not take effect.

You need to install Magisk and enable the Riru - Core and Riru - IFW Enhance modules.

Each time this application is launched, the IFW rules created by this application will be cleared when you click "Got it" and the set rules will be invalidated and will take effect again after you click Submit.
Clean up, please restart the application
App: hjthjthjt\nRiru - Core: Rikka\nRiru - IFW Enhance: Kr328

The implementation of this application relies on the following two Magisk modules, you must install them or RnShareClean will not take effect.

You can find them in the Magisk repository, or go directly to the Github release download from the link below.

Please note: Due to version uncertainty, Riru - Core and Riru - IFW Enhance will most likely not support the version of Magisk that you have installed.
